messages.title: Labour On Your Side in Coventry South
messages.content: Unlike the Conservative Government of the 1980s we won't walk on by in difficult times. I'm determined to ensure we deliver fairness for all in the recovery.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will guarantee every 18-24 year old unemployed for six months a job, training or college place.
Labour will create a right to test results within one week if your GP suspects you have cancer.
Free care at home for those with the highest needs, funded by efficiencies in the NHS and local government.
Labour will tackle families that create anti-social behaviour, with family intervention schemes.
Halve the deficit in four years by going for growth, taxing bankers' bonuses and efficiencies in lower priority expenditure.

issues.economy: Labour wants to see a country that invests in its younger people and will protect and value our older generation.
issues.health: Labour will create a right to test results within one week if your GP suspects you have cancer.
issues.socialWelfare: Free care at home for those with the highest needs, funded by efficiencies in the NHS and local government. Labour will tackle families that create anti-social behaviour, with family intervention schemes.

leaflet.personalStatement: I strongly believe Labour has the right policies to see this country emerge from the global economic downturn stronger and more resilient.

contactInformation.address: Coventry South Labour Party, Freepost NAT 23005, Coventry. CV5 6BR
